mn137:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn137:3.8: Taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn137:3.9: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
mn137:4.1: “‘Cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni veditabbāni, cha bāhirāni āyatanāni veditabbāni, cha viññāṇakāyā veditabbā, cha phassakāyā veditabbā, aṭṭhārasa manopavicārā veditabbā, chattiṃsa sattapadā veditabbā, tatra idaṃ nissāya idaṃ pajahatha, tayo satipaṭṭhānā yadariyo sevati yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahati, so vuccati yoggācariyānaṃ anuttaro purisadammasārathī’ti—

mn137:9.12: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ. (5)
mn137:10.4: Cha gehasitāni somanassāni, cha nekkhammasitāni somanassāni, cha gehasitāni domanassāni, cha nekkhammasitāni domanassāni, cha gehasitā upekkhā, cha nekkhammasitā upekkhā.
mn137:10.6: Cakkhuviññeyyānaṃ rūpānaṃ iṭṭhānaṃ kantānaṃ manāpānaṃ manoramānaṃ lokāmisapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ paṭilābhaṃ vā paṭilābhato samanupassato pubbe vā paṭiladdhapubbaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vipariṇataṃ samanussarato uppajjati somanassaṃ.
mn137:10.7: Yaṃ evarūpaṃ somanassaṃ idaṃ vuccati gehasitaṃ somanassaṃ.
mn137:10.15: Yaṃ evarūpaṃ somanassaṃ idaṃ vuccati gehasitaṃ somanassaṃ.

mn137:11.9: Yaṃ evarūpaṃ somanassaṃ idaṃ vuccati nekkhammasitaṃ somanassaṃ.

mn137:13.2: Rūpānaṃ tveva aniccataṃ viditvā vipariṇāmavirāganirodhaṃ, ‘pubbe ceva rūpā etarahi ca sabbe te rūpā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya disvā anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpeti:
mn137:13.3: ‘kudāssu nāmāhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharissāmi yadariyā etarahi āyatanaṃ upasampajja viharantī’ti iti anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato uppajjati pihapaccayā domanassaṃ.
mn137:13.4: Yaṃ evarūpaṃ domanassaṃ idaṃ vuccati nekkhammasitaṃ domanassaṃ.

mn137:13.11: ‘kudāssu nāmāhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharissāmi yadariyā etarahi āyatanaṃ upasampajja viharantī’ti iti anuttaresu vimokkhesu pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato uppajjati pihapaccayā domanassaṃ.
mn137:13.12: Yaṃ evarūpaṃ domanassaṃ idaṃ vuccati nekkhammasitaṃ domanassaṃ.
mn137:14.2: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjati upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa puthujjanassa anodhijinassa avipākajinassa anādīnavadassāvino assutavato puthujjanassa.
mn137:14.3: Yā evarūpā upekkhā, rūpaṃ sā nātivattati.
mn137:14.9: manasā dhammaṃ viññāya uppajjati upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa puthujjanassa anodhijinassa avipākajinassa anādīnavadassāvino assutavato puthujjanassa.
mn137:14.10: Yā evarūpā upekkhā, dhammaṃ sā nātivattati.

mn137:15.3: Yā evarūpā upekkhā, rūpaṃ sā ativattati.
mn137:15.9: dhammānaṃ tveva aniccataṃ viditvā vipariṇāmavirāganirodhaṃ, ‘pubbe ceva dhammā etarahi ca sabbe te dhammā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato uppajjati upekkhā.
mn137:15.10: Yā evarūpā upekkhā, dhammaṃ sā ativattati.

mn137:16.4: Tatra, bhikkhave, yāni cha nekkhammasitāni somanassāni tāni nissāya tāni āgamma yāni cha gehasitāni somanassāni tāni pajahatha, tāni samatikkamatha.
mn137:16.5: Evametesaṃ pahānaṃ hoti, evametesaṃ samatikkamo hoti.
mn137:17.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yāni cha nekkhammasitāni domanassāni tāni nissāya tāni āgamma yāni cha gehasitāni domanassāni tāni pajahatha, tāni samatikkamatha.
mn137:17.2: Evametesaṃ pahānaṃ hoti, evametesaṃ samatikkamo hoti.
mn137:18.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yā cha nekkhammasitā upekkhā tā nissāya tā āgamma, yā cha gehasitā upekkhā tā pajahatha tā samatikkamatha.
mn137:18.2: Evametāsaṃ pahānaṃ hoti, evametāsaṃ samatikkamo hoti.
mn137:19.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yāni cha nekkhammasitāni somanassāni tāni nissāya tāni āgamma yāni cha nekkhammasitāni domanassāni tāni pajahatha, tāni samatikkamatha.
mn137:19.2: Evametesaṃ pahānaṃ hoti, evametesaṃ samatikkamo hoti.
mn137:20.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yā cha nekkhammasitā upekkhā tā nissāya tā āgamma yāni cha nekkhammasitāni somanassāni tāni pajahatha, tāni samatikkamatha.
mn137:20.2: Evametesaṃ pahānaṃ hoti, evametesaṃ samatikkamo hoti.
mn137:21.1: Atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhā nānattā nānattasitā, atthi upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā.
mn137:21.2: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, upekkhā nānattā nānattasitā?
mn137:21.3: Atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhā rūpesu, atthi saddesu, atthi gandhesu, atthi rasesu, atthi phoṭṭhabbesu—
mn137:21.5: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā?
mn137:21.6: Atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhā ākāsānañcāyatananissitā, atthi viññāṇañcāyatananissitā, atthi ākiñcaññāyatananissitā, atthi nevasaññānāsaññāyatananissitā—
mn137:22.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yāyaṃ upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā taṃ nissāya taṃ āgamma yāyaṃ upekkhā nānattā nānattasitā taṃ pajahatha, taṃ samatikkamatha.
mn137:22.2: Evametissā pahānaṃ hoti, evametissā samatikkamo hoti.
mn137:23.1: Atammayataṃ, bhikkhave, nissāya atammayataṃ āgamma yāyaṃ upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā taṃ pajahatha, taṃ samatikkamatha.
mn137:23.2: Evametissā pahānaṃ hoti, evametissā samatikkamo hoti.
mn137:23.4: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
mn137:24.1: ‘Tayo satipaṭṭhānā yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahatī’ti—
mn137:24.4: Idha, bhikkhave, satthā sāvakānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti anukampako hitesī anukampaṃ upādāya:
mn137:24.6: Tassa sāvakā na sussūsanti, na sotaṃ odahanti, na aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapenti, vokkamma ca satthusāsanā vattanti.
mn137:24.7: Tatra, bhikkhave, tathāgato na ceva anattamano hoti, na ca anattamanataṃ paṭisaṃvedeti, anavassuto ca viharati sato sampajāno.
mn137:24.8: Idaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahati.
mn137:25.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, satthā sāvakānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti anukampako hitesī anukampaṃ upādāya:
mn137:25.3: Tassa ekacce sāvakā na sussūsanti, na sotaṃ odahanti, na aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapenti, vokkamma ca satthusāsanā vattanti;
mn137:25.4: ekacce sāvakā sussūsanti, sotaṃ odahanti, aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapenti, na ca vokkamma satthusāsanā vattanti.
mn137:25.5: Tatra, bhikkhave, tathāgato na ceva anattamano hoti, na ca anattamanataṃ paṭisaṃvedeti;
mn137:25.6: na ca attamano hoti, na ca attamanataṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.
mn137:25.8: tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.
mn137:25.9: Idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, dutiyaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahati.
mn137:26.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, satthā sāvakānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti anukampako hitesī anukampaṃ upādāya:
mn137:26.3: Tassa sāvakā sussūsanti, sotaṃ odahanti, aññācittaṃ upaṭṭhapenti, na ca vokkamma satthusāsanā vattanti.
mn137:26.4: Tatra, bhikkhave, tathāgato attamano ceva hoti, attamanatañca paṭisaṃvedeti, anavassuto ca viharati sato sampajāno.
mn137:26.5: Idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, tatiyaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahati.
mn137:26.6: ‘Tayo satipaṭṭhānā yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahatī’ti—
mn137:26.7: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
mn137:27.4: Hatthidamakena, bhikkhave, hatthidammo sārito ekaṃyeva disaṃ dhāvati—
mn137:27.5: puratthimaṃ vā pacchimaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā dakkhiṇaṃ vā.
mn137:27.6: Assadamakena, bhikkhave, assadammo sārito ekaññeva disaṃ dhāvati—
mn137:27.7: puratthimaṃ vā pacchimaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā dakkhiṇaṃ vā.
mn137:27.8: Godamakena, bhikkhave, godammo sārito ekaññeva disaṃ dhāvati—
mn137:27.9: puratthimaṃ vā pacchimaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā dakkhiṇaṃ vā.
mn137:27.10: Tathāgatena hi, bhikkhave, arahatā sammāsambuddhena purisadammo sārito aṭṭha disā vidhāvati.
mn137:27.17: sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati—
mn137:27.19: sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘anantaṃ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati—
mn137:27.21: sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati—
mn137:27.23: sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati—
mn137:27.25: sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharati—
mn137:27.27: Tathāgatena, bhikkhave, arahatā sammāsambuddhena purisadammo sārito imā aṭṭha disā vidhāvati.
mn137:27.30: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttan”ti.
mn137:28.2: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
